Calculates each stat penalty independently.<br><br>【Panic】<br>Converts bonuses on target into penalties through its next action.<br><br>【Dagger ７】<br>After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-７ on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
